titles.title: O Lord of Heaven and Earth and Sea

comments.comment: This hymnal has not been proofed - data may be incomplete or incorrect

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O Lord of heav'n and earth and sea, to Thee all praise and glory be; how shall we show our love to Thee who givest all?

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: The golden sunshine, vernal air, sweet flow'rs and fruits Thy love declare; when harvests ripen, Thou art there, who givest all.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: For peaceful homes and healthful days, for all the blessings earth displays, we owe Thee thankfulness and praise, who givest all.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thou didst not spare Thine only Son, but gav'st Him for a world undone, and freely with that blessed One Thou givest all.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Thou giv'st the Holy Spirit's dow'r, Spirit of life and love and pow'r, and dost His sev'nfold graces show'r upon us all.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: For souls redeemed, for sins forgiv'n, for means of grace and hopes of heav'n, Father, what can to thee be giv'n, who givest all?
